name: Mirror Sorcerer
description:
Grab your broomstick and your magic mirror to free the forest from the corrupted stone totems. 

One sourcere must cast magic spells and the other can deflect them with the mirror.

Avoid getting shot by the enemies with the help of the magic mirror of your partner.

Are you smart enough to cooperate to defeat the hardest totems?

Controls:

Two gamepads are required to play the game.

  • Left joystick -> Movement.
  • Right joystick -> Aim.
  • Right bumper -> Shoot.

This is a short demo I made in my spare time. I hope you like the concept!

Credits:

Programming, Design, 3D art, VFX, GUI and Music by me :)
